Summary: Brite object going southwest to north east at low altitude
trends: There have been 74 other sightings in Stephenville
There were 6 other sightings in Stephenville on or around November 19th 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsI was walking from one building to another at work when I saw what look like a dim light star to the southwest but it instantly became brighter and was moving very fast toward me going northeast. The object was very brite, I thought it might be the landing lights on a plane, but as it passed over head I never saw any blinking of any kind and if it was a jet (because of the rate of speed it was going) it had no sound that I could make out. As it went into the Northeast sky it dimmed and vanished. the only explanation I can think of is that it was a satalite, but afterward there was a large amount of air traffic then there usually is at this time of evening. I just happen to catch to whole episode, because I have gotten into the habit of looking into the sky due to the number of ufo sightings in Stephenville. I felt like I was loosing my mind at what I was seeing and there not being any logical explanations for it other than it being a satalite, but like I said the air traffic got heavy afterward, which makes me wounder what did I see.
